AgendaParlamentar.InternetText: <p style="text-align: justify;">Audi&ccedil;&atilde;o do Ex-Secret&aacute;rio de Estado das Finan&ccedil;as do XXII Governo Constitucional e ex-Secret&aacute;rio de Estado do Tesouro no XXIII Governo Constitucional da Rep&uacute;blica Portuguesa, Dr. Jo&atilde;o Nuno Mendes, a <a href="https://app.parlamento.pt/webutils/docs/doc.pdf?path=nWGhLqRgDNJwRoIKpKk%2bKc8C%2bR3ecYD8tqczoCuA722RzHT1gDR0a%2bmJhl%2be3lZkYEjXjpbhfrSAc%2fcZAuvCzlld61WkUsXcPIHCrbq1SJynvP0IJdDZB87FUgBATSbHHU4AC5NheR7dzZLGdPgwC0Yc7XXePbRfyUVMKSTiGiwgSvCV2f4VfDtik7w%2bdM8wYSGPRY3guXaDDeS8EKA5oD0ZmH3jKSmzui5BCqlojWK9P7Yv9gCcuDildxzfogwK%2f650P8YUEmOQR19UE1s3jjE7WtcKZ1R5QdZMxngfV9Bn66zBxkuX4VVN8AvHKMybiQGpnuU%2bP%2fysoOgkSRq16RHPVx96Bo3A%2bFEREb%2ftqIiUNaPLfiykcaRps%2fI66%2fqSVOgIE4AAEjR%2buvTFry5Gt7%2bvfpSIvc0OYejXatwlJHhjT%2fIzJXHiIIioEGGfP3xsjuTYoiqQt55o2aoL8yeCqVLKPAK1yz3cBm%2fMTiF4GDcSZ%2f3eXYhaIfH%2fi2zPheic&amp;fich=008+-+PSD+-+Audi%c3%a7%c3%b5es+de+v%c3%a1rias+entidades+no+%c3%82mbito+EFACEC+-+Aprovado.pdf&amp;Inline=true">requerimento</a> do Grupo Parlamentar do PSD, no &ldquo;&acirc;mbito da tutela pol&iacute;tica da EFACEC&rdquo;.</p>
